thread.title: Hurricane Patricia makes slow-motion assault on Mexico coast PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Hurricane Patricia makes slow-motion assault on Mexico coast | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Hurricane Patricia makes slow-motion assault on Mexico coast PBS NewsHour
text: Police and fire units combed the Mexican resort community of Puerto Vallarta Friday morning, urging people to flee Hurricane Patricia, which has been called the strongest storm ever seen on the continent. David Alire Garcia of Reuters talks to Judy Woodruff from a makeshift shelter in Puerto Vallarta about the preparations and evacuations ahead of landfall.
